meanings.sent1: I heard the loud shuting of the door.
meanings.sent2: Please remember the shuting of the windows before leaving.
meanings.sent3: The shuting of the book signaled the end of the story.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like the gentle shuting of a door, closing off her emotions.
meanings.sent5: The shuting of the gate echoed through the empty street.

meanings.definition: The process of stopping access to a place
meanings.sent1: The shuting of the entrance prevented anyone from coming in.
meanings.sent2: The shuting of the road due to construction caused a detour.
meanings.sent3: The shuting of the park for maintenance disappointed the visitors.
meanings.sent4: His determination was a shuting barrier against any distractions.
meanings.sent5: The shuting of the border led to increased security measures.

meanings.definition: The action of blocking or obstructing something
meanings.sent1: The shuting of the path with fallen trees made it impassable.
meanings.sent2: The shuting of the drain caused flooding in the street.
meanings.sent3: The shuting of the website due to maintenance surprised the users.
meanings.sent4: The shuting of the sun by dark clouds brought sudden darkness.
meanings.sent5: The shuting of the tunnel entrance trapped the explorers inside.
